column72: Custom field (Посилання на профіль викладача в ТТ)

column25:
*Precondition:*

Open [Link|https://qauto2.forstudy.space/panel/garage]. User is logged in. 

*StR:*
 #  Click on [Settings]. 
 #  Scroll down to the "Remove account" section

*Actual result:*

The “Delete account” block is 10 pixels wide, and the text is broken up.

*Expected result:*

The “Delete account” block should be 810 pixels wide.

column1: Incorrect result when searching for car instructions.
column25:
*Precondition:*
 # Open [Link|https://qauto2.forstudy.space/panel/garage]. User is logged in. 
 # Click [Instructions].

*StR:*
 # Click on "Car brand selector". 
 # Click "BMW".
 #  Click on "Car model selector".
 #  Click on "3".
 # Add miles.
 # Click [Search].

*Actual result:*
 # A list of cars has appeared.
 #  The selection is recorded in the car brand selection field.
 # A list of car brands has appeared.
 #  The selection is recorded.
 #  Miles added.
 # +One instruction manual for AUDI was found, and many for BMW.+

!Ауді.png|width=254,height=123!

 

*Expected result:*

+The system found instructions exclusively for the car specified in the search.+

*Precondition:*

Open [Link|https://qauto2.forstudy.space/panel/garage]. User is logged in. 

*StR:*

1. Click  [About]

*Actual result:*

For registered users, the [about] button is not available.

!About 2.png|width=272,height=104!

*Expected result:*

The button is located in the application, as shown in the project documentation.

!about.png|width=427,height=128!

column1: the "Roll" button is not blocked when pressed repeatedly
column25:
Preconditions :

1.click [here|https://craps.students.hillel.it/]

2.input valid name for 1-st and 2-nd players

StR:

1.Click [Start game]

2.Click the [Roll] batton multiple times.

[^r.mp4]

AcR :

New numbers are formed and written in the field of each player

ExR :

After pressing the “Roll” button, it is locked while the dice are rolling.

Postconditions:

1.Click [End game]

2.Click [Yes, reset the game].

column1: The “Date of expire” field does not put a “/” between the month and year.
column25:
*Precondition* :

1.Open app  [HelpCatsapp.10.3.M|https://kitties.students.hillel.it/].

2.Click [Donate]

{*}StR{*}:
 #  Enter the 4 numbers in field input  data of expire.

 

{*}AcR{*}:
 # The system does not insert the “/” symbol between the year and month, which causes an error and requires manual entry of this symbol.

       !jj.png|width=215,height=239!

     

*ExR* :

The system automatically inserts the “/” symbol after the month number has been entered.

column1: Numeric fields do not block letter input
column25:
*Precondition* :

1.Open app  [HelpCatsapp.10.3.M|https://kitties.students.hillel.it/].

2.Click [Donate]

{*}StR{*}:
 #  Enter the letters in the card's numerical data (card number, data od expire, CVV).

 

{*}AcR{*}:
 # The system accepts letters entered in numeric fields and displays a message stating that the field must contain a “certain” number of digits.

 

   !78.png|width=175,height=204!   !ffffffff-2.jpg|width=281,height=211!

     

*ExR* :
 # The system blocks the entry of letters in numeric fields.

column1: The system accepts donations when the card balance is zero.
column25:
h4. Precondition
 # Open app  [HelpCatsapp.10.3.M|https://kitties.students.hillel.it/].
 # Open the menu with cards.
 # The card whose details are to be entered must have a zero balance.
**

 

*StR:* 
 # Click [Donate] in the left corner .
 # Enter valid cardholder name, card number, card expiration date, CVV code, amount.   
 # Check the box in the Agree team service window and Click the “Confirm payment” button 

*AcR:*
 # The “Donate” tab opens.
 # The system accepted the data.
 # System show pop-up "Thamk you".  System show on card balance "-100".

!12.jpg|width=245,height=173!      !13-1.jpg|width=295,height=174!
h4.  
h4. ExR:
 # The “Donate” tab opens.
 # The system accepted the data.
 # A pop-up window appears with the message “Transaction failed, try again”.

column1: In the “name” field, the system accepts Cyrillic characters as valid data.
column25:
Precondition :

1.Open app  [HelpCatsapp.10.3.M|https://kitties.students.hillel.it/].

2.Click [Account]

3.Click [+] in the left corner of the app.

StR:
 # Enter a word in Cyrillic in the “name” field, for example, “Pharmacy”(Аптека).
 #  In the “Last name” field, enter your last name using valid characters(for exemple : DE).
 # Click [Create a virtual card].    

AcR:
 # The system accepts Cyrillic characters as valid data..
 # The system accepted the letters as valid data.
 # The card was created.

!какакакакакакака.jpg|width=367,height=236!

ExR :
 #  System show massage "Input valid data".
 # The system has accepted the entered data.
 #  The “create virtual card” button remains inactive.

column1: Enter digit and period  in the “name” field
column25:
Precondition :

1.Open app  [HelpCatsapp.10.3.M|https://kitties.students.hillel.it/].

2.Click [Account]

3.Click [+] in the left corner of the app.

StR:
 # Enter one digit and one period  in the “name” field.
 #  In the “Last name” field, enter your last name using valid characters(for exemple : Show).
 # Click [Create a virtual card].    

AcR:
 # The symbols “1” and “.” were accepted by the system as valid.
 # The system accepted the letters as valid data.
 # The card was created.

!котики.jpg|width=283,height=187!

ExR :
 #  System show massage "Input valid data".
 # The system has accepted the entered data.
 #  The “create virtual card” button remains inactive..

column1: Enter one number and one letter in the “name” field.
column25:
Precondition :

1.Open app  [HelpCatsapp.10.3.M|https://kitties.students.hillel.it/].

2.Click [Account]

3.Click [+] in the left corner of the app.

StR:
 # Enter one number and one english letter in the “name” field.
 #  In the “Last name” field, enter your last name using valid characters(for exemple : Show).
 # Click [Create a virtual card].    

AcR:
 # One digit and one english letter in the “name” field were accepted by the system as valid data for the “name” field.
 # The system accepted the letters as valid data.
 # The card was created.

!котики2.jpg!

ExR :
 #  System show massage "Input valid data".
 # The system has accepted the entered data.
 #  The “create virtual card” button remains inactive..
